Using the '$' operator
# Horror Flicks/ shows ratings

```{r}
# define vector

ratings <- c('8','7','9','10','4')

#provide names

names(ratings) <- c('scream','the_ring','shining','riverdale','sabrina')

# convert to data frame

data_x <- as.data.frame(t(ratings))   #t = transpose


```

```{r}

# display data frame
data_x

#access value for 'sabrina'

data_x$sabrina

```
